awards.text: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

fullplot: Anna Nicole Smith was a single mother from Texas who became the biggest supermodel in the world, but her sudden catapult to fame came with a price, as drugs, alcohol and reckless behavior led her down a tragic path.
plot: The life of Anna Nicole Smith, from small town dancer to Playboy centerfold, to her marriage to a billionaire, and her eventual self destruction.
title: Anna Nicole
